text: In view of the annual feast festival of St.Antony’s Shrine at Puliampatti, the Nagercoil- Coimbatore passenger train (56319) and Madurai- Punalur passenger train (56700) will stop for one minute at Naraikkinaru railway station temporarily on February 7th and 10th (two days only) for the benefit of worshippers, M. Shajahan, Assistant Commercial Manager said in a statement on Friday.
title: Temporary stoppage at Naraikkinaru
